channel.title: ---~ Realm Of Fury | Pk | Economy | Fun ~---
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/67626576/RSPS%20to%20the%20next%20level.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/Links.png[/img] [URL=http://http://www.rofonline.com/]WEBSITE[/URL] [URL=http://http://www.rofonline.com/]WEBCLIENT[/URL] [URL=http://http://www.mediafire.com/?9h6h9ymkw7fudyo]Download Client[/URL][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/Welcome.png[/img]
Welcome to the official advertisement thread of Realm Of Fury - RSPS server. This thread includes most of the information about the server.
RoF is Economy / pk / PvM based server with lot's of fun stuff to do!
[IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/Whatwegot.png[/img]
- 24/7 active community with active staffmembers. - Only professional staff members with the most and the best knowledge around! - Custom minigames and training places! - Donator area with custom donator shops and extra NPC's to train with! - Duel arena and castlewars! - Active PvP and PvM community! - Working Clan Chat with lootsharing! - PK point store with chaotic weapons and claws! (an lot's of other goodies!) - Slayer points! (Tasks are: Easy, Normal and hard tasks. Hard tasks for faster lvl) - Active forums with lot's of ingame information and handwritten guides by others! - All the skills exept dungeoneering! (Dungeoneering is soon done!) - Vote for cash and Refer a friend for cash system! - Nex (drops torva, virtus etc. ) - Jad - Corporal Beast - Avatar of destruction - Barrelchest boss - King Black Dragon - Jungle, Desert and ice wyrms (WITH RARE DROPS!) - lot's of commands (in game do ::commands for them.) - Hunting areas (With implings!) - BEAUTIFUL ECONOMY! - Webclient and Downloadable client! - Summoning with familiars! - Chaotic, Vesta, barrows armors/weps, Claws ETC! - AND MUCH MORE!
[IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/Media.png[/img]
[SIZE="5"]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FtJk8aIBff4[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1321-56-29-67.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1321-57-22-36.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1321-57-53-71.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1321-58-59-95.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1321-59-34-38.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1322-00-36-85.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1322-01-09-21.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1322-02-01-44.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1322-02-19-76.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1322-02-28-82.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1322-03-21-82.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1322-04-25-19.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1322-05-16-79.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1322-06-31-02.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1322-07-11-12.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1322-07-25-42.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-1322-07-58-55.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

item.title: ---~ Realm Of Fury | Pk | Economy | Fun ~---
item.dc:creator: @wyrelade wyrelade
item.description:
@wyrelade wrote:

[CENTER]


WEBSITE
WEBCLIENT
Download Client[/SIZE]

Welcome to the official advertisement thread of Realm Of Fury - RSPS server.
This thread includes most of the information about the server.

RoF is Economy / pk / PvM based server with lot’s of fun stuff to do!

  • 24/7 active community with active staffmembers.
  • Only professional staff members with the most and the best knowledge around!
  • Custom minigames and training places!
  • Donator area with custom donator shops and extra NPC’s to train with!
  • Duel arena and castlewars!
  • Active PvP and PvM community!
  • Working Clan Chat with lootsharing!
  • PK point store with chaotic weapons and claws! (an lot’s of other goodies!)
  • Slayer points! (Tasks are: Easy, Normal and hard tasks. Hard tasks for faster lvl)
  • Active forums with lot’s of ingame information and handwritten guides by others!
  • All the skills exept dungeoneering! (Dungeoneering is soon done!)
  • Vote for cash and Refer a friend for cash system!
  • Nex (drops torva, virtus etc. )
  • Jad
  • Corporal Beast
  • Avatar of destruction
  • Barrelchest boss
  • King Black Dragon
  • Jungle, Desert and ice wyrms (WITH RARE DROPS!)
  • lot’s of commands (in game do ::commands for them.)
  • Hunting areas (With implings!)
  • BEAUTIFUL ECONOMY!
  • Webclient and Downloadable client!
  • Summoning with familiars!
  • Chaotic, Vesta, barrows armors/weps, Claws ETC!
  • AND MUCH MORE!

[SIZE=“5”]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FtJk8aIBff4[/SIZE]

















[/CENTER]
